item.title: shared memory utilities
item.description: 1 RTFM… 1.1 ipcs 1.2 ipcrm 2 Check shared memory in Linux 本文为摘录，原文为： https://linuxopsys.com/topics/check-shared-memory-in-linux 1 RTFM… 链接到标题 1.1 ipcs 链接到标题 1.2 ipcrm 链接到标题 2 Check shared memory in Linux 链接到标题 Print active shared memory segments using -m
